name: SeedSync
description: SeedSync is a tool to sync the files on a remote Linux server (like your seedbox, for example). It uses LFTP to transfer files fast!
short_desc: SeedSync is a tool to sync the files on a remote Linux server.
author: Inderpreet Singh

form_fields.label: UID
form_fields.hint: Ensure any volume directories on the host are owned by the same user you specify

form_fields.label: GUID
form_fields.hint: Ensure any volume directories on the host are owned by the same group you specify
